restart.description: Determines if the enemy should respawn.

findPlayer.description: Determines if the enemy detects the player from anywhere.

isBoss.description: Determines if the enemy is a boss.

isFixed.description: Determines if the enemy is static.

appearPath.description: Name of the spline in a PATH file for the enemy to follow.

appearVelocity.description: The speed the object moves at.

actionPath.description: Name of the spline in a PATH file for the enemy to follow.

attackTarget.description: Target for the enemy to attack before spotting the player.

homingTarget.description: Target for the enemy to fly to when destroyed.
